author: @Vijestime
title: Ministry: Mujoviƒá made it possible for the workers of the EPCG Nik≈°iƒá Ironworks to be paid winter wages
text: The Minister of Energy and Mining, Sa≈°a Mujoviƒá, made it possible for the workers of the EPCG Nik≈°iƒá Steel Plant to be paid winter pay, as is the practice for employees of the Electric Power Industry of Montenegro, the Ministry of Energy and Mining announced. "Obligations to employees must be settled until a strategic partner is found and in communication with the company's trade union," Mujoviƒá said. The Ministry said that on December 11, the parent company Elektroprivreda Crne Gore (EPCG) announced a public invitation to lease production facilities in its daughter company - ≈Ωeljezara to interested investors. "Those interested are given the opportunity to apply until January 25 of the following year. Until a credible partner enters the company, the obligations to the employees remain with the active involvement of the Ministry of Energy and Mining, which is in contact with all interested companies with broad diplomatic activity to find investors which will ensure investments and engagement of as many workers as possible, as well as expanding the business portfolio. To this end, Minister Mujoviƒá is in constant communication with the Electric Power Company of Montenegro as well as the Union of Railway Workers, in order to find the best solutions for problems in the transition period, such as is the issue of salary and winter pay," said the Ministry of Energy and Mining. Bonus video:

author: larques@elplural.com (Lirios Arques)
title: La AEMET advierte de un dr√°stico cambio: llegan fuertes tormentas y granizo a estas zonas
text:
Toca desempolvar los paraguas. Tras unas jornadas donde las consecutivas olas de calor han puesto en alerta a todo el pa√≠s y donde se han llegado a superar los 40¬∫C varios d√≠as en multitud de puntos de la pen√≠nsula y los archipi√©lagos, un cambio dr√°stico de tiempo llega a Espa√±a. Se prev√© que la entrada de una vaguada atl√°ntica provoque fuertes precipitaciones y bajada de temperaturas especialmente en el √°rea noreste peninsular. Seg√∫n ha confirmado la Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (AEMET), las zonas donde m√°s se va a notar este cambio ser√°n el sur de Arag√≥n, el norte de la Comunitat Valenciana y el norte de Catalu√±a, donde se podr√≠an dar precipitaciones acompa√±adas de granizo y fuertes rachas de viento.
‚õàÔ∏è El viernes se formar√°n tormentas en el nordeste peninsular. Atenci√≥n, porque en zonas del sur de Arag√≥n, norte de la Comunitat Valenciana y norte de Catalu√±a, podr√°n ir acompa√±adas de granizo y rachas muy fuertes de viento.‚Äî AEMET (@AEMET_Esp)
[pic.twitter.com/57ZFioXOBP] [August 1, 2024]
Por su parte, el portal de meteorolog√≠a Meteored ha se√±alado que este cambio se debe a la entrada de "una peque√±a vaguada casi imperceptible en los mapas, que cruzar√° r√°pidamente la mitad norte peninsular en las pr√≥ximas horas". Pese a que se espera que las lluvias remitan pronto, advierten igualmente que se producir√°n hasta "cuatro fen√≥menos de riesgo" con las provincias de Teruel, Castell√≥n y Tarragona como epicentro de estos. "Los granizos podr√≠an llegar a alcanzar los 5 cent√≠metros de di√°metro".
Por lo que se refiere a las rachas de viento, se√±alan que podr√≠an registrarse rachas de hasta 100 km/h.
‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö° En unas horas estallar√°n fuertes‚Äî Meteored | tiempo.com (@MeteoredES)
[#tormentas]con posibles reventones üí® y granizo grande. ¬øD√≥nde ser√°n m√°s adversas?
üëâ
[@samuel_biener]tiene todos los detalles. [https://t.co/8kMzGasfGB] [pic.twitter.com/2aUJONNGOj] [August 2, 2024]
Pese a ello, las elevadas temperaturas que han protagonizado las √∫ltimas semanas, seguir√°n la misma tendencia en los pr√≥ximos d√≠as en la mayor parte del pa√≠s. Aunque podr√≠an descender en el nordeste peninsular, seguir√°n al alza en zonas del interior sur y depresiones del noreste peninsular donde superar√°n los 35 grados, y zonas del Guadalquivir, donde podr√≠an alcanzar nuevamente los 40¬∫C. Por lo que se refiere a las m√≠nimas, tambi√©n seguir√°n los mismos patrones, sin bajar de los 25¬∫C en el √°rea mediterr√°nea.
El anuncio de la AEMET se produce de manera simult√°nea al relativo a la predicci√≥n estacional de los pr√≥ximos tres meses. La Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a ya ha adelantado que las temperaturas ser√°n m√°s elevadas de lo normal en los pr√≥ximos meses de agosto, septiembre y octubre. Seg√∫n ha comentado Andr√©s G√≥mez, meteor√≥logo y presentador de El Tiempo en TVE, "la AEMET prev√© que las temperaturas en general en toda Espa√±a se mantengan por encima de los valores normales. Las probabilidades son especialmente altas en todo el centro, sur y este peninsular y el archipi√©lago balear. Y las probabilidades son algo m√°s bajas, pero tambi√©n por encima de lo habitual en el Cant√°brico y Galicia y en el archipi√©lago canario, concretamente, hay un 60% de posibilidades de que sea este periodo m√°s c√°lido de lo normal en esa zona del noroeste y Canarias y del 70%, en el resto de la pen√≠nsula y Baleares".

author: justice.gov
title: Office of Public Affairs | Minnesota Man Sentenced to 10 Years in Prison for Providing Material Support to ISIS | United States Department of Justice
text:
Press Release Minnesota Man Sentenced to 10 Years in Prison for Providing Material Support to ISIS Thursday, June 13, 2024 Share Facebook X LinkedIn Email For Immediate Release Office of Public Affairs A Minnesota man was sentenced to 120 months in prison followed by 15 years of supervised release for providing material support to the Islamic State of Iraq and al-Sham (ISIS), a designated foreign terrorist organization. Based on the defendant‚Äôs cooperation, the government asked the court to give the defendant credit for providing substantial assistance.
According to court documents, in June 2015, Abdelhamid Al-Madioum, 27, of St. Louis Park, Minnesota, departed the United States with his family to Casablanca, Morocco, to visit extended family. Once in Morocco, Al-Madioum surreptitiously fled to Syria to join and fight for ISIS. During the following several months, Al-Madioum was administratively enrolled into ISIS, received military training from its members and assigned to a battalion. Al-Madioum served as a soldier for ISIS until late 2015 when he was injured while conducting military activities on behalf of ISIS. Following his injury, Al-Madioum continued to provide assistance to ISIS as a personnel database administrator. He remained a member of ISIS until he was captured by Syrian Democratic Forces in March of 2019.
Assistant Attorney General Matthew G. Olsen of the Justice Department‚Äôs National Security Division, U.S. Attorney Andrew M. Luger for the District of Minnesota and Executive Assistant Director Larissa L. Knapp of the FBI‚Äôs National Security Branch made the announcement.
The FBI investigated the case.
Trial Attorney John Cella of the National Security Division‚Äôs Counterterrorism Section and Assistant U.S. Attorney Andrew R. Winter for the District of Minnesota prosecuted the case.
Updated June 13, 2024

author: O Diaz
title: Anuncia Solidaridad descuentos en pago del predial 2024 - Quadratin Quintana Roo
text:
SOLIDARIDAD, QRoo, 28 de diciembre de 2023.- La administraci√≥n municipal dirigida por la presidente Lili Campos otorga descuentos en el pago del impuesto predial 2024 a los propietarios, poseedores o fiduciarios de propiedades inmobiliarias, siempre y cuando el pago sea cubierto en una sola exhibici√≥n y se cubra todo el ejercicio fiscal del a√±o.
El objetivo del gobierno de Lili Campos es espaldar la econom√≠a y facilitar el cumplimiento de obligaciones tributarias de los solidarenses.
Durante el periodo del 1 al 30 de enero de 2024, los contribuyentes recibir√°n un descuento del 25 por ciento. Asimismo, del 31 de enero al 29 de febrero de 2024, se aplicar√° un descuento del 15 por ciento. Es importante destacar que estos beneficios estar√°n sujetos a la condici√≥n de que la propiedad no presente adeudos de 2023 o a√±os anteriores y debe realizarse el pago total del impuesto predial en una sola exhibici√≥n.
Para apoyar a sectores espec√≠ficos de la poblaci√≥n, se establecen descuentos especiales. Se otorga el 50 por ciento de descuento a los contribuyentes que tengan alguna discapacidad, adultos mayores, pensionados y jubilados.
Adem√°s, se otorgar√° el 40 por ciento de descuento a los trabajadores al servicio del Ayuntamiento de Solidaridad, a los trabajadores de los organismos descentralizados de la administraci√≥n p√∫blica municipal y a los trabajadores al servicio del Gobierno del Estado de Quintana Roo (que laboren en √°reas de salud y servicios educativos).
En ambos casos, deber√°n cubrir los siguientes requisitos: no tener alg√∫n adeudo de 2023 o a√±os anteriores, se debe cubrir el importe en una sola exhibici√≥n, es para un inmueble y que corresponda a su domicilio (casa habitaci√≥n), la propiedad debe estar a nombre del solicitante y el valor catastral no debe exceder un monto de hasta 20 mil U.M.A. (2 millones 74 mil 800 pesos o su equivalente para el a√±o 2024).
Para recibir los descuentos, deber√°n presentar copia del √∫ltimo recibo de pago predial. En descuentos especiales, copia de su credencial oficial (Inapam o Insen) o cualquier otro documento id√≥neo con el que pruebe tal supuesto.
Para los trabajadores, deber√°n presentar copia de la credencial de trabajo o cualquier otro documento con el que acrediten ser empleados de los organismos antes mencionados.
Los pagos pueden realizarse en las cajas del Palacio Municipal Nuevo y del Centro, as√≠ como en diversas oficinas y puntos de atenci√≥n, incluyendo SARE, Desarrollo Agropecuario, Protecci√≥n Civil, Tr√°nsito Municipal, Instituto de las Mujeres en Villas del Sol, Canaco Servitur, Puerto Aventuras en la Alcald√≠a y en la Marina.

author: @Dailymirror_SL
title: HNB and 3W Global Education join hands to empower students
text:
Reply To:
Name - Reply Comment
HNB Deputy General Manager Retail Banking Group Sanjay Wijemanne and 3W Education (Pvt.) Ltd Managing Director Stefan Moreas exchange the MoU in the presence of (from left) HNB Mortgage Advisor Anjula Sampath, HNB Manager Home and Personal Loans Sampath Dodanwela, HNB Manager Bambalapitiya Dhanushka Rajapakse, HNB Assistant General Manager Personal Financial Services Kanchana Karunagama, 3W Education (Pvt.) Ltd Chief Commercial Officer Roshan Gurusinghe and 3W Education (Pvt.) Ltd Chief Operating Officer Arshini Skandarajah
Sri Lanka‚Äôs leading private sector bank HNB PLC partnered 3W Global Education (Pvt.) Ltd (3WGE), a trailblazer in providing educational services, to empower students with affordable financial solutions.
The partnership will offer comprehensive education loan packages with low interest rates during the promotional period.
HNB Deputy General Manager Retail Banking Group Sanjay Wijemanne, Assistant General Manager Personal Financial Services Kanchana Karunagama, 3WGE Managing Director Stefan Moreas, Chief Commercial Officer Roshan Gurusinghe and Chief Operating Officer Arshini Skandarajah were present at a special ceremony held at HNB Towers.
Commenting on the collaboration Karunagama said, ‚ÄúWe believe in the power of education to transform lives and we are privileged to collaborate with 3WGE to provide students with affordable financing options that will open doors to higher education and brighter futures. This partnership exemplifies our dedication to empowering Sri Lankan youth and fostering a well-educated workforce.‚Äù
HNB will extend special interest rates during a promotional period, coupled with flexible repayment options tailored to the budget of each student.
Echoing similar sentiments Moraes said, ‚ÄúWe are excited to partner with HNB to make higher education more accessible to students across Sri Lanka. This partnership will provide students with the financial support they need to pursue their dreams and contribute to Sri Lanka‚Äôs future. We are committed to providing students with the best possible educational opportunities and we believe that this partnership will make a real difference in the lives of many.
At 3WGE, we believe in the transformative power of education and this partnership with HNB aligns seamlessly with our mission to support students in realising their academic dreams. Together we aim to provide financial solutions that will enable students to overcome their financial barriers and embark on enriching overseas educational journeys.‚Äù
3WGE, a subsidiary of 3W Group, is one of the pioneers in the overseas education industry since 2004, with accreditations from the Australian, New Zealand and European High Commissions. 3WGE represents over 1000 universities and colleges placing thousands of students across the world in top-ranked countries such as Australia, the UK, Canada, the USA, New Zealand, Ireland, Switzerland, Dubai, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam and Cyprus.
HNB was ranked among the World‚Äôs Top 1,000 Banks list compiled by the prestigious UK-based Banker Magazine for the sixth consecutive year in 2022, in addition to being crowned as the Best Retail Bank in Sri Lanka for the 13th occasion at the prestigious International Excellence in Retail Financial Services Awards 2023 hosted by the Asian Banker Magazine.
